full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG L'U AI PA'I LUGS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR KYI CHOG BDE CHEN ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA MKHAS GRUB DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @057B DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG L'U AI PA'I LUGS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR CHEN POR 'JUG CING DBANG BYUNG BA'I CHO GA BDE CHEN @058A *, ,ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, 'DUS PA DANG BDE MCHOG GI THON MONG GI BSHAD RGYUD RDO RJE 'PHRENG BA LAS, DBANG BCU BZHI'I RNAM BZHAG GSUNGS PA'I RJES SU 'BRANGS SHING, L'U DRIL GNYIS THUN MONG GIS CHOG PA RNAMS RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO RANG NYID KYIS MDZAD PA'I L'U AI GU PA'I DKYIL CHOG GZHIR BZHAG CING, L'U DRIL GYI MI 'DRA BA'I KHYAD PAR DBYE DGOS PA RNAMS, ,D'A RIG PA DANG, LANG KA RGYAL BZANG DANG, DKYIL CHOG RDO RJE 'PHRENG BA DANG, RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO'I LAM GYI RIM PAR GSUNGS BDAG LAS, ,GONG 'JUG PA BDE BA DANG, SKABS SU JI LTAR BAB PA BYIN BKOD DE, ,DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS THAMS CAD KYI MKHYEN BRTZE GCIG TU BSDUS PA'I NGO BO, RDO RJE 'CHANG DANG DBYER ME MCHIS PA'I RJE BTZUN BLA MA TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO NYID KYI ZHABS KYI PADMO LA SPYI BOS REG PA'I RDO RJE 'DZIN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS, ,GTZANGS NYANG STOD RIG PA'I 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS 'CHI, ,DPAL RI BO MDANGS CAN GYI GSOL BAR SBYAR BA'O, ,)
